title: Propaganda
lyrics:
4 Contributors
Propaganda Lyrics
[Baby Keem]
Welcome to pgLang, an at-service company. Get the f******. Break formulas for the curious. Focus on development, youthful talent. Focus on development, youthful talent. Unique stories, design, and most of all unique taste. F*** the bullshit. They always tell you what you can't do.

[Baby Keem]
Some shit for the critics, and some shit for the crowd.
Do you have the tools? pgLang.

[Baby Keem - "STATS"]
Ayy, yeah, yeah, yeah, hol' up
Ayy, first thing's first when I pop, I'ma get your ho thirsty
I sign my paycheck in cursive, I'm worthy (Yeah)
Hoes in the fifth always talkin' 'bout my fashion
I tell her watch her tone, Baby Keem ain't no virgin (Yeah, yeah)
Bitch, I don't have insurance to the wheels because I skrrt it (Yeah, yeah)
I just lied to your bitch, she want me to insert it (Ayy, yeah)

[Baby Keem - "trademark usa"]
Yuh, hol' up, rockin' on that
Bitch I'm swaggin', dumb, hol' up
Trademark in that bitch, I trademark in my new, new bitch, yeah...
I can't help but feel offended
Changin' up my schedule every time you leave the session
(One more time)
I can't help but feel offended
I can't help but feel offended
Changin' up my schedule every time you leave the session
Fuckin' on somethin', one more time, fuck, man



[Baby Keem - "sons & critics freestyle" (Slowed Down)]
You a critic, boy, shut the fuck up
I'm a freak ho, hit her, dawg, and I'm in the cut
She on white, 'cause I energize her way too much
If we got up on a pic, ho, it's time to pick it up, up, up, up
And my neck King Tut, ah-ha-ha

[Kendrick Lamar]
Okay, last time. This is love. This is your brain on-

[Baby Keem]
Sometimes you get lost in the sauce. Tryna figure out why it work for them and it don't work for you. Come to pgLang, where creators can be true. You can do you.
